content: The small avatar takes some time to load in the user popover which results in a blank area for a few secs. Should we do something about it?
I think a simple solution is to show the popover only when the smaller image is loaded.
Ahh, is this when clicking in the right sidebar?
Yeah. Right sidebar or the sender name in message.
I think only right sidebar. In the message feed, we're guaranteed to have the small avatar already fetched from the server, but that's not true in the right sidebar.
But I am facing delay in loading of images by clicking the sender name too.
Hmm, not sure why that would be. If the browser already has the image in cache, loading the image should be instant
And I certainly can only reproduce using the right sidebar
Ahh, can you check your JS console @Vishnu Ks? I have a few 503s from gravatar on the larger-size avatar requests
